name: Apple Shot (scuttman)
description:
Hi all! 

This was a quick prototype I made up when on my Christmas break, and finally got round to finishing it. This game is very basic but I hope it shows off the idea I had. This project is designed to show off the mechanics and only these, since I'm a gameplay programmer. So don't go to hard on the level and UI design :) Also it doesn't have sound as I didn't get round to adding it.

I hope you enjoy it!

Twitter: @_Scuttman_
